de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.methods.segmentation.dict

Class DictMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.methods.Methods
      • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.methods.segmentation.SegmentationMethods
        • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.methods.segmentation.dict.DictMethods
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DictMethodAPI

    public class DictMethods
extends SegmentationMethods
implements DictMethodAPI
    Class for parsing a text to segment using dictionary based approaches.
    Author:
    Timo Homburg
